name: My Garden Planner

name: Tune Blast
description: This was a collaborative project that myself and one other classmate worked on from my Coding Bootcamp. The appllication allows you to look up lyrics from your favorite band's songs

name: Team Profile Generator
description: This is a CLI application that allows a person to enter in information about a company's employees. It produces an HTML page that shows the hirearchy of employees similar to an organization chart
languages: Node.js | Inquirer | JavaScript | Bootstrap | CSS | HTML

name: Weather Dashboard
description: This is an application that shows the current weather, 5-day forcast and UV Index by city. Search history is persistant utilizing local storage
